mapper.sql: msg_id, memb_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT mi.* FROM zhfw_memb_info mi INNER JOIN ( SELECT smr.msg_id, smr.memb_id FROM send_message_reciver smr, send_message sm WHERE sm.id = #{id} AND smr.msg_id = sm.id AND sm.del_flag = '0' ) smt ON smt.memb_id = mi.id WHERE mi.del_flag = '0'
